{{ user.firstName }}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {User} from "../../models/users"; import {UsersService} from "../../services/users.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent implements OnInit { users: User[] = []; constructor(private UsersService: UsersService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.UsersService.getUsers().subscribe((users: User[]) => { this.users = users; }); } }
